# AVCaptureDevice.PrimaryConstituentDeviceSwitchingBehavior.unsupported

**Case**

The device doesn’t support constituent device switching.

## Declaration

```swift
case unsupported
```

## Discussion

Switching cameras isn’t supported on devices that don’t have more than one constituent device.

## Switching behaviors

- **AVCaptureDevice.PrimaryConstituentDeviceSwitchingBehavior.auto**: The device automatically selects the best camera for the current scene.
- **AVCaptureDevice.PrimaryConstituentDeviceSwitchingBehavior.restricted**: The device restricts fallback camera selection to certain conditions.
- **AVCaptureDevice.PrimaryConstituentDeviceSwitchingBehavior.locked**: The device locks camera switching to the active primary constituent device.
